description: Landscaping services and maintenance at various sites throughout Canadian Forces Base (CFB) at 17 Wing in Manitoba
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

**Reference Number:** WS4529124752-Doc4529685694 (WS4529124752, numéro-reference)

**Publication Date:** 2024-04-16 (datePublication)

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-23T14:00:00 (appelOffresDateCloture)

**Amendment Number:** 3 (numeroModification)

**Solicitation Number:** WS4529124752 (numeroSollicitation)

**Title:** W4M00-24C481-Grass Cutting and Landscaping services (W4M00-24C481-Services_de_tonte_de_pelouse_et_d_am_nagement_paysager)

**Contact Information:**

* Tanya Gostev (SPAC/PSPC) (elle-la / she-her)
* Phone: None
* Email: [tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19419435?extsite=MTk0MTk0MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Procurement Details:**

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* Solicitation Type: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* Countries Covered: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Manitoba (Manitoba)
* Period of Performance: 2024-06-01 to 2026-06-09 (dateDebutContratPrevue à dateFinContratPrevue)
* Expected Contract Value: Not specified

**Description:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the supply of all labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision necessary to provide landscaping services and maintain designated areas on an "as and when requested" basis at various sites throughout Canadian Forces Base (CFB) at 17 Wing in Manitoba. The Offeror may attend the optional site visit on Thursday, [02 May 2024 at 9:30am CST](https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/converter?iso=[2024-05-02T10^_30^.00reading是一个uttWL_lines8100Immediately-mark
